channel.title: Memorex Online v2
channel.description:
[center][b][size=17pt]Memorex Online v2[/size][/b]
Hi, well, basically, this thread is to advertise for the new server, Memorex Online v2. So now, i'm going to tell you why you should play it. You ready?
[b]Features:[/b] - 100% custom town where edgeville is / used to be - completely new training castle, and other training places outside of the wild, located around what was known as edgeville. - shops to buy the usual equips and items - original traning places are still in place so there will be no short of room for you to level - rscd 25 source - 15 min logout, no fatigue - fully capable admins that WILL go out of their way to try and help you in the time they have - no mods have been selected based out of friendship towards the admins, they will be chosen based off of forum and game actions - as far as advancement in servers, i'd have to say this is the most advanced out at the moment - there are no custom items or overpowered armour and weapons - the exp rate is perfect, giving 5 levels from the first man you kill
here is the client download: http://www.speedyshare.com/402406485.html
[/center]

item.title: Memorex Online v2
item.dc:creator: @Argation Argation
item.description:
@Argation wrote:

[SARCASM]
hey i have the most advancedsted server of all right here on my pc. localhost ftw!

it has rats and guards and wilderniss![/SARCASM]

on a more bright note, why bother saying you are the most advanced? is this another of those “mine is bigger then yours things boys deal with?”… i mean, none of theservers are really advanced anywayz… most are built on unstable frameworks and will do pisspoor when getting alot of players… but yea agility or a new town makes it the most advanced.

Read full topic

item.title: Memorex Online v2
item.dc:creator: @firewithin3 firewithin3
item.description:
@firewithin3 wrote:

[quote=“Stashah, post:14, topic:246701”][quote author=firewithin3 link=topic=325657.msg2552854#msg2552854 date=1227722349]

[quote author=Stashah link=topic=325657.msg2552698#msg2552698 date=1227708436]
Most advanced server around? Lmao, idiot, you are forgetting about RSCFobia and RSCA.

This server is not even likely to be like real-rsc. This is custom, so dont call it rsc server. Mofo.
[/quote]You’re server isn’t anything near real-rsc either. All you did was add shitty agility, and now because you added shitty agility, it’s suddenly the most advanced server? Just stfu about your server and about your shitty agility, it’s nowhere near the most advanced.
[/quote]Hi mr Kyle’s buttmate.

Put on your glasses and read more about my updates on my website, douche. There is alot-alot more, agility is just a little add-on and this is also really improved. So gtfo and go back to suck Kyle’s…

Kyle, you can gtfo, if you haven’t made anything ever, neither made a server or just a simple script, then shut the fuck up and keep off your gay critisizm, since this is not adequate.

Oh, and RSCFobia had on it’s first 2 nights over 20 online and later on nearly 50 online, normally.

It just went down because I was inactive back then, but now times have changed and people are starting to come back. All they need is a little event, that would bring them all together, that’s all. Playerscount would raise over 40 atleast, but point is, I don’t have any events yet, there is still alot of time until Christmas, so, the playercount will raise right now naturally and you’ve got to stfu and get to know about these things, before you open your mouth.[/quote]So because you added a few commands, edited values in xml files, and added shitty agility your server is all of the sudden the best? No, it’s not, Mr. Ego. Just stfu about your server, it’s no different from other ones.

Read full topic

item.title: Memorex Online v2
item.dc:creator: @dear_god1 dear god
item.description:
@dear_god1 wrote:

[quote=“xT-e, post:6, topic:246701”]its different to all the other servers
not the same old shit over and over.

it makes it look cooler!!!

lul

I hardly think you can comment on how good a server is, you’ve been constantly asking how to everything.[/quote]

how to everything?

I’m going to go ahead and assume you meant 'How to do everything" in which case, I posted 2 topics. One asking how i set an id to an npc and another asking someone to give me a hint on how to eliminate vials, WHICH i did by myself with no ones help.

Also, i can comment on how good any server is. Why? because I’m allowed to have an opinion just like everyone else.

From what i saw by your post all you did was edit the map and xml files. You don’t need to talk shit to someone when that’s all you know how to do.

And no, a new map + an edited NPCLoc doesn’t make it advanced.

Read full topic
